javax.json

Class JsonPatchBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.json.JsonPatchBuilder

  • public class JsonPatchBuilder
extends Object
    A builder for constructing a JSON Patch by adding JSON Patch operations incrementatlly.

    The following illustrates the approach. 

       JsonPatchBuilder builder = new JsonPatchBuilder();
   JsonArray patch = builder.add("/John/phones/office", "1234-567")
                           .remove("/Amy/age")
                           .build();
    The result is equivalent to the following JSON Patch. 
     [
    {"op" = "add", "path" = "/John/phones/office", "value" = "1234-567"},
    {"op" = "remove", "path" = "/Amy/age"}
 ]

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonPatchBuilder()
      Creates JsonPatchBuilder with empty JSON Patch
      JsonPatchBuilder(JsonArray patch)
      Creates a JsonPatchBuilder, starting with the specified JSON Patch

        Returns:
        the transformed target after the patch
        Throws:
        JsonException - if the supplied JSON Patch is malformed or if it contains references to non-existing members
